meanings.definition: Showing or expressing a bad temper or sullen attitude.
meanings.sent1: She was the groutiest person in the room, frowning at everyone.
meanings.sent2: His groutiest expression scared away the other kids on the playground.
meanings.sent3: Even though he tried to hide it, his groutiest face always gave away his true feelings.
meanings.sent4: Her groutiest mood was like a dark cloud hanging over the family dinner.
meanings.sent5: The groutiest cat in the shelter refused to be petted by anyone.
